titles.title: To ensure that certain entrepreneurial development services of the Small Business Administration are made available to cannabis-related legitimate businesses and service providers, and for other purposes.
Ensuring Access to Counseling and Training for All Small Businesses Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
